citeinfo.origin: Ecotrust, Pacific GIS, and Conservation International
citeinfo.title: Coastline - Prince William Sound, Copper River Ecosystem

descript.abstract: Data Type: Ocean/Coasts ; This layer contains full resolution, composite coastline data for the Prince William Sound - Copper River Ecosystem. Pacific GIS built the composite coastline layer by using the largest scale data available for each given area. Pacific GIS incorporated datasets from the Chugach National Forest, the Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), and the USGS/EROS Alaska Field Office in the composite coastline layer. A data layer containing 1:63,360 quad boundaries has been intersected with the coastline to break up complex polygons.

idinfo.accconst: Data transfer costs will be based on staff time and media costs.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
